headline: A Look At Tapestry (TPR) Valuation As Recent Returns Contrast With A High P/E Multiple
summary: What Tapestry’s Recent Performance Tells You Tapestry (TPR) has drawn fresh attention as investors weigh its recent share performance against the company’s current fundamentals, including revenue of US$7,207.8m and net income of US$271.4m in its latest reported year. See our latest analysis for Tapestry. At a share price of US$126.91, Tapestry has seen short term share price pressure, including a 1 day share price return of 0.33% decline and a 7 day share price return of 2.41% decline...
